entity_action.description: If specified, this entity action will be executed on the player upon placing a block.
entity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this entity action will be executed on the player upon placing a block.

held_item_action.description: If specified, this item action will be executed on the item the player has used to place a block.
held_item_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this item action will be executed on the item the player has used to place a block.

place_to_action.description: If specified, this block action will be executed at the position of the block the player has placed.
place_to_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this block action will be executed at the position of the block the player has placed.

place_on_action.description: If specified, this block action will be executed on the block the player placed a block on.
place_on_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this block action will be executed on the block the player placed a block on.

item_condition.description: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the item the player has used to place a block fulfills this item condition.
item_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the item the player has used to place a block fulfills this item condition.

place_to_condition.description: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the block at the position of the block the player is about to place fulfills this block condition.
place_to_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the block at the position of the block the player is about to place fulfills this block condition.

place_on_condition.description: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the block the player is about to place a block on fulfills this block condition.
place_on_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the block the player is about to place a block on fulfills this block condition.

directions.description: Determines whether the specified actions should be executed if the player is about to place a block at the specified side(s) of a block.
directions.markdownDescription: Determines whether the specified actions should be executed if the player is about to place a block at the specified side(s) of a block.

hands.description: Determines whether the specified actions should be executed if the player used the specified hand(s) when trying to place a block.
hands.markdownDescription: Determines whether the specified actions should be executed if the player used the specified hand(s) when trying to place a block.

result_stack.description: If specified, this item stack will be given to the player upon placing a block.
result_stack.markdownDescription: If specified, this item stack will be given to the player upon placing a block.

result_item_action.description: If specified, this item action will be executed on the item that will be given to the player upon placing a block.
result_item_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this item action will be executed on the item that will be given to the player upon placing a block.
